sentences.sentence: 心がドキドキする
sentences.sentenceMeaning: My heart is beating

sentences.sentence: 私の心臓は興奮でどきどきしていた
sentences.sentenceMeaning: My heart was pounding with excitement

sentences.sentence: 彼女に会った時、胸がどきどきした
sentences.sentenceMeaning: I felt my heart beating when I met her

sentences.sentence: ドキドキして待ちきれない
sentences.sentenceMeaning: I’m excited and can’t wait!

sentences.sentence: 木の葉が庭でくるくると舞っていた
sentences.sentenceMeaning: The leaves whirled in the yard

sentences.sentence: 彼はくるくる気が変わる
sentences.sentenceMeaning: He's always changing his mind

sentences.sentence: 部屋がくるくると回っていた
sentences.sentenceMeaning: The room span around me

sentences.sentence: 小船はあらしの中でぐらりぐらりと揺れた
sentences.sentenceMeaning: The boat lurched about in the storm

sentences.sentence: デザートにはふわふわのスフレを食べた
sentences.sentenceMeaning: I enjoyed a light souffle for dessert

sentences.sentence: 枕をふわふわにしてあげるね
sentences.sentenceMeaning: I'll fluff up the pillows for you

sentences.sentence: 強い風のせい、花びらはバラバラになりました
sentences.sentenceMeaning: The strong wind caused the petals to be scattered

sentences.sentence: ビーズが入った箱落としたら、ビーズがバラバラに散らばっちゃった！
sentences.sentenceMeaning: I dropped a box of beads and they were scattered everywhere!

sentences.sentence: 私はお店の中をうろうろしていた
sentences.sentenceMeaning: I wandered around in the store

sentences.sentence: 友達が来るまでは暇だったので、駅の周りをうろうろしていました
sentences.sentenceMeaning: I had some spare time before my friend arrived, so I wandered around the station

sentences.sentence: まくらはとてもぐにゃぐにゃだった
sentences.sentenceMeaning: The pillow was very squishy

sentences.sentence: 星はきらきらと輝いた
sentences.sentenceMeaning: The stars sparkled

sentences.sentence: 湖は月光できらきらしていた
sentences.sentenceMeaning: The lake sparkled in the moonlight

sentences.sentence: 雷がゴロゴロと鳴っている
sentences.sentenceMeaning: The thunder is rumbling

sentences.sentence: 猫は幸せなときにゴロゴロと喉を鳴らす
sentences.sentenceMeaning: Cats purr when they are happy

sentences.sentence: この床はごしごしとよく磨く必要がある
sentences.sentenceMeaning: This floor needs a good scrub

sentences.sentence: 毎日、日本語を勉強するとどんどんうまくなるよ
sentences.sentenceMeaning: If you study Japanese every day, you will get better and better.

sentences.sentence: 私はわくわくしています
sentences.sentenceMeaning: I am excited!

sentences.sentence: みんなでクラブ行くなんてめっちゃわくわくするね！
sentences.sentenceMeaning: I am really excited that we're going to the club!
